long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Relay Auto booker
Introducing the ultimate load management solution for Amazon Relay users - our innovative extension streamlines the load booking process and optimizes your operations like never before.

Update 1.17 - November 2024
COMPATIBLE  WITH  JULY-AUGUST 2024 UPDATES
Fix autobook feature

✔️ Automated load refreshing: Our extension will autorefresh the load board at a specific time, ensuring that you never miss out on available loads.
✔️Automated load booking: With the correct filters applied, our extension can auto book loads, saving you valuable time and effort.
✔️Real-time alerts: Our extension provides real-time alerts for new load availability and price changes, so you're always up-to-date and in control.

Compatible with amazon relay from USA, UK, France, Poland, Czechia, Italy, Spain and Germany
Compatible with both loadboard interfaces.
Not compatible with the latests update that does not contain green highlight on a new or updated load.
Works on active tab

Pricing: $99/month for the all features

Say goodbye to the hassle of manual load searching and booking - our extension handles everything for you, leaving you free to focus on other critical aspects of your operations. And with customizable settings and notifications, you can rest assured that you're always in control of your load management process.

Whether you're a new Amazon Relay user looking to get started on the right foot, or a seasoned pro seeking to streamline your operations and maximize your efficiency, our extension is the perfect solution. Try it today and experience the future of load management!

Have questions or feedback?
Contact: relaymate.contact@gmail.com
